alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 10 at 3:46PM EST until March 10 at 4:30PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 430 PM EST. * At 346 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Quitman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cherry Lake, Nankin, Pinetta, Empress, Clyattville and Hanson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
